SOCIALS
Usage: <social> [<victim>]
Socials are commands used to show your affective state to others. The actor, victim and bystanders may receive different messages. Generally, social commands are used only to express emotion and not to take action, but it is possible that some mobs (or players) will take action based on the social. (Slap a dragon lately?)
Example:
> shake homer > applaud marge > stare
The SOCIALS command generates a canonical listing of all available socials.
> socials
See also: EMOTE
